movies.title: End of Watch
movies.plot: Two young officers are marked for death after confiscating a small cache of money and firearms from the members of a notorious cartel during a routine traffic stop.

events.title: Cops Brian Taylor and Mike Zavala encounter the Bloods while out on patrol
Taylor and Zavala save three children from a house fire
Taylor and Zavala are ambushed, and both are shot

movies.title: Black Mass
movies.plot: The true story of Whitey Bulger, the brother of a state senator and the most infamous violent criminal in the history of South Boston, who became an FBI informant to take down a Mafia family invading his turf.

events.title: Whitey Bulger is captured, at the age of 81
